titleStmt.title: To the High Court of Parliament of England, Scotland, and Ireland the humble petition of Richard Ford, Nathaniel Manton, and Thomas Papillon, of London, merchants.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Richard, Sir, d. 1678.
Manton, Nathaniel.
Papillon, Thomas, 1623-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
